text: Abdourahamane Tchiani (also Omar Tchiani) is a Nigerien army general and the commander of the Nigerien presidential guard. He played a key role in the 2023 Nigerien coup d'Ã©tat by arresting president Mohamed Bazoum. Later, he proclaimed himself as the Chairman of the National Council for the Safeguard of the Homeland. ==References== Category:1960s births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Niger Category:African military people
title: Abdourahamane Tchiani
